comments: Number of partitions of n into parts 1, 2, 5 and 6. - _David Neil McGrath_, Dec 06 2014Number of walks (closed) on the graph G(1-vertex; 1-loop, 2-loop, 5-loop, 6-loop) where the order of loops is unimportant. - _David Neil McGrath_, Dec 06 2014
links: Index entries for two-way infinite sequences
example: There are 6 partitions of n=6 into parts 1, 2, 5 and 6. These are (6)(51)(222)(2211)(21111)(111111). - _David Neil McGrath_, Dec 06 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
